page.title: 10A TYPICAL DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: On Saturday mornings I get up about nine thirty then I have a hot drink and something to eat. After that I usually go swimming then I go home for my dinner. After that I go and help two of the local people over at the cricket field cafe,though different people do it each week.I stay all day at the cafe we make the food for the cricketers then we tidy up. It takes us ages,I always have my tea at the cafe on Saturdays so I don't need any when I get home. On Saturday nights I stop in now. I didn't used to though, I used to go out with my friends who live across the road. Now I play on my atari unless there is anything good on t.v. Sometimes on Saturdays I go to my sisters. I also go a lot in the week. I think Saturday is my favourite day.
